full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,GU RU ZHI RGYAS DBANG DRAG GI BSKANG GSO DNGOS GRUB CHAR 'BEBS BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @015B (YI DAM GU RU ZHI RGYAD DBANG DRAG GI BSKANG GSO DNGOS GRUB CHAR 'BEBS ZHES BYA BA 'DI, PHYOGS MED DHARMA S'A RTA MING CAN GYIS, ,RANG GIS DAD DANG GUS PA'I STOBS DBANG GI ,NGO TSA MED PAR MNGA' BDAG GTER MA LA, LHAN THABS KYIS PA'I DGE BA'I BDAG GZHAN RNAMS, ,DE NAS BYANG CHUB SNYING PO MCHIS GYI BAR, YI DAM BSTAN BSRUNG KHYOD DANG MI 'BRAL ZHING, ,TSE 'DI NYID LAS SANGS RGYAS MYUR THOB SHOG ,BKRA SHIS GYUR CIG , ,,)
